LenovoEventRecord.description: This is Lenovo extended details of event service properties.
LenovoEventRecord.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an object used to represent event details.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EventInformation.description: This is Lenovo extended Event Log Information.
EventInformation.longDescription: The event log information has two kinds: standard event log and active event log.

SystemMachineTypeModel.description: Represents the Machine Type Model of the system.
SystemMachineTypeModel.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the machine type model of the system.

SystemSerialNumber.description: Represents the Serial Number of the system.
SystemSerialNumber.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the serial number of the system.

SystemUUID.description: Represents the UUID of the system.
SystemUUID.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the UUID of the system.

title: #LenovoEvent.v1_0_0
